appetizers.description: House-battered and breaded portobello mushrooms, deep fried, topped w/ peppers & chopped parsley. Served w/ garlic aoli sauce.
Hand-rolled w/ taro, impossible beef, mung bean, ,carrots, glass noodle, and mushrooms. Served w/ lettuce, fresh herbs, and vegan fish sauce.
House-battered soft tofu pieces, deep fried, topped ,w/ peppers & chopped parsley. Served w/ house-made plum sauce.
House-battered soft tofu pieces, deep fried, topped ,w/ peppers & chopped parsley. Served w/ house-made plum sauce.

entrees.description: Vegan beef, broccoli, cauliflower, carrots, mushrooms, and tofu stir fried with our General Tso sauce. Served w/ white rice and spring mix.
Vegan beef strips, vegan meatballs, tofu, mushroom, scallions, onions, cilantro, and rice noodle in our house-made pho broth.
Vegan beef strips, Vietnamese vegan ham, vegan meatballs, tofu, scallions, cilantro, mushrooms, onions, and rice noodle in our house-made broth.
Yellow noodles, mushroom, bok choy, duckless meat, carrots, and goji berries in our house-made herbal soup broth.
Rice noodle, vegan chicken and impossible beef, mushroom, tofu, broccoli, and carrots.
White and yellow noodles, char siu tofu, mushroom, carrots, broccoli, and cabbage. Served in our house-made vegetable broth. [GF option available]
Rice noodles w/ tomato-based soup, tofu paste, mushroom, water spinach, vegan ham, tofu, and green onions. Topped w/ fried onions and cilantro.
Our tomato-based noodle soup w/ vermicelli noodles, tomatoes, tofu paste, mushroom, tofu, green onions, fried onions, and topped w/ cilantro.
Vegan meatballs, potatoes, carrots, and kale. Topped w/ cilantro. Served on a french baguette.
Creamy coconut curry w/ shredded vegan chicken, tofu, potatoes, carrots, and green beans. Topped w/ cilantro. Served w/ choice of rice or baguette.

entrees.en: Fishless Cake w/ Noodles & Baby Dill ü•ú
entrees.description: Vermicelli noodle, crispy fishless cake, bell pepper, onions, bean sprout, dill leaves, roasted peanuts, and vegan fish sauce.
Rice noodle, mushroom, fried tofu, vegan chicken, and house-made sauce. Served w/ steamed bean sprout, carrots, peanuts and lime.
Yellow noodles stir fried w/ vegan chicken, mushroom, and broccoli. Topped w/ vegan parmesan and parsley.
Crispy chow mein w/ vegan chicken, tofu, green onions, broccolli, bok choy, carrots, chinese spinach, mushroom, and vegan oyster sauce.
Lo mein w/ vegan chicken, tofu, green onions, broccolli, bok choy, carrots, chinese spinach, mushroom, and vegan oyster sauce.
Choice of crispy or soft noodle. Rice noodle dish w/ vegan chicken, tofu, green onions, broccolli, bok choy, carrots, chinese spinach, mushroom, and vegan oyster sauce. [GF option available]

Vermicelli noodle w/ eggrolls, shredded vegan pork (combination of taro, tofu, jicama), green onions, fried onions, bean sprout, cucumbers, shredded lettuce, and mint leaves. Topped w/ pickled carrots, daikon and peanuts. Served w/ vegan fish sauce.
White rice w/ vegan bacon, green peas, carrots, tofu, vegan chicken, cilantro and green onions. [GF option available]
Breaded cauliflower w/ house-made orange sauce. Served w/ white rice and side salad.

onBread.description: Ciabatta bread topped w/ vegan ham, vegan mayo, grilled onions, and melted vegan cheddar and parmesan. Served with a side salad.
Ciabatta bread topped w/ impossible beef crumbles, vegan mayo, grilled onions, melted vegan provolone and mozzarella cheese. Served with a side salad.

drinks.en: Organic Jasmine or Earl Grey Hot/Iced Tea
Can of Sprite, Coke, or Diet Coke

dessert.description: Rich and creamy house-made vegan custard w/ our coffee caramel sauce.
